attributes.action: Introduce a system of Direct Democracy in the UK, wherein issues voted by the public, through achieving a particular level of support through electronic petition, are decided upon by a referendum to be carried out electronically
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many people feel the Government to be remote and not to take account of their views. We don't therefore feel we live in a true democracy. Introduction of Direct Democracy for significant issues, as per the Swiss model, would overcome this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
